title: CFOs Speak: Straight Talk From Chevron and a Biotech Pioneer
description: The oil major’s finance chief Eimear Bonner and Alnylam’s Jeff Poulton talk about 2026 and what’s ahead for their companies.
content: The oil major’s finance chief Eimear Bonner and Alnylam’s Jeff Poulton talk about 2026 and what’s ahead for their companies.
